TopicTitle: A ship which has "landed" no longer has a trajectory line, even once in flight

Articles.Content:
The ship actually hadnt landed, but it had landed on another save, but thats a separate issue. It seems like any ship after landing doesnt have a trajectory line any more, and cant get one again, no matter how fast you might be going. I was nearly in orbit and I still had no line, and therefor could not make any maneuver nodes.

Stock installation, no mods

Windows 10/Steam

Ryzen 1700X

RTX 2070 Super
